Distinct<T, TU>(IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, TU>)

Returns distinct elements from a sequence by using a specified key selector function.

Declaration
public static IEnumerable<T> Distinct<T, TU>(this IEnumerable<T> data, Func<T, TU> getKey)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IEnumerable<T> data

The sequence to remove duplicate elements from.
Func<T, TU> getKey

A function to extract the key for each element.
Returns
Type Description
IEnumerable<T>

An IEnumerable containing distinct elements from the source sequence.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of elements in the sequence.
TU

The type of the keys returned by the key selector function.
